idea-plugin.description:
Jetpack Compose Wrapper

Speed up your Compose development with this handy productivity tool!

Compose Wrapper is an IntelliJ/Android Studio plugin that allows you to quickly wrap your Composable functions (like Text, Button, Image, etc.) with common layout containers.

üöÄ Key Features:

  • Instant Wrapping: Quickly wrap any Composable with Row, Column, Box, LazyRow, or LazyColumn.
  • Smart Imports: Automatically adds the necessary Jetpack Compose imports to your file.
  • Auto-Formatting: Cleans up and reformats the code immediately after wrapping.
